pr_title: Fixes running select integration tests from intellij

timeline.message:
Fixes running select integration tests from intellij

The intellij test runner has some issues with tests that are run
if integrationTest depends on test. Remove that dependency and
this fixes the issue.

timeline.bodyText: Quick question: kokoro/continuous.sh runs build and integrationTest. What's the difference between build and check?
timeline.author: chanseokoh
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -39,8 +39,8 @@ if [[ $(git status -uno --porcelain) ]]; then
   Die 'There are uncommitted changes.'
 fi
 
-# Runs integration tests.
-./gradlew :jib-build-plan:integrationTest --info --stacktrace
+# Runs checks and integration tests.
+./gradlew :jib-build-plan:check :jib-build-plan:integrationTest --info --stacktrace

replies.bodyText: yeah I should've mentioned, build  already runs check (but not integrationTest, we always have had integration test be explicit)
replies.author: loosebazooka

replies.bodyText: check runs all tests, checkstyle and format things
replies.author: loosebazooka
